name: be-db-advanced-designey-mxx1029
description: 1. Install Draw.io OR use it in your browser     2. Save your results as an image into this repository     3. Design data tables for an app like Twitter         - What kind of data types would you have where you have             - User, Message, what else?          - What kind of functions would these types have?             - User can login, create tweet, what else?     4. Initialize a node app into this repository         - **Do not commit node_modules**         - Add mongoose as a dependancy         - Create at least one of your data table designs into a schema.
